row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_RM.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JSON_BODY_FOR_CUSTOM_TYPE
row.description: Build Json body for custom type property

row.process: : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """custom_type"": {") : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """name"": ""&UC4RB_ETT_TYPE#""") : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, "},")
